title: Define System Architecture
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the RealTimeVideoProcessingCluster that can handle thousands of video streams simultaneously.

title: Design Clustering Strategy
description: Develop a strategy for clustering video processing nodes to ensure efficient and scalable distribution of video streams.

title: Develop Real-time Video Processing Algorithms
description: Design and implement real-time video processing algorithms suitable for applications like surveillance or live streaming.

title: Create Video Streaming API
description: Design and implement a RESTful API for managing video streams and processing requests in the RealTimeVideoProcessingCluster.

title: Implement Video Processing Node
description: Develop and test the video processing node implementation based on the defined system architecture.

title: Test and Optimize Performance
description: Conduct performance tests on the video processing node implementation and optimize its efficiency.

title: Integrate with External Storage Systems
description: Integrate the RealTimeVideoProcessingCluster with external storage systems for efficient data management and scalability.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Design and implement security measures to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of data in the RealTimeVideoProcessingCluster.
